settings.html:
<style>

        :root {
            --black: #000000;
            --white: #FFFFFF;
            --cream: #FAF6F0;
            --brown: #59473C;
            --accent: #4ECDC4;
            --warning: #F4D03F;
            --danger: #E74C3C;
            --border: 3px solid var(--black);
        }

        * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
        html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }
        body {
            font-family: 'Sometype Mono', monospace;
            background: var(--cream);
            color: var(--black);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; }

        /* STICKY TOC */
        .toc {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 100;
            background: var(--black);
            border-bottom: var(--border);
            padding: 12px 0;
        }
        .toc-inner {
            display: flex;
            gap: 24px;
            overflow-x: auto;
            scrollbar-width: none;
        }
        .toc-inner::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; }
        .toc-link {
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 11px;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0.7;
            transition: opacity 0.2s;
        }
        .toc-link:hover { opacity: 1; color: var(--accent); }

        /* HERO */
        .hero {
            background: var(--cream);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .hero-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 400px;
            gap: 40px;
            align-items: start;
        }
        .hero-badges { display: flex; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; flex-wrap: wrap; }
        .badge {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .badge--tier { background: var(--accent); }
        .badge--location { background: var(--white); }
        .badge--date { background: var(--warning); }
        .badge--distance { background: #FFB830; }
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 64px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .hero-tagline {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
        }
        .hero-intro {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
            max-width: 540px;
        }

        /* SCORE CARD */
        .score-card {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .score-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .score-main {
            font-size: 80px;
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }
        .score-main span { font-size: 32px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .tier-label {
            font-size: 12px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .score-breakdown {
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            padding-top: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
        .breakdown-row {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .breakdown-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }
        .breakdown-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 8px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            margin: 0 16px;
        }
        .breakdown-bar-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .breakdown-score {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 600;
            min-width: 50px;
            text-align: right;
        }

        /* SECTIONS */
        .section {
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .section--dark { background: var(--brown); color: var(--white); }
        .section--black { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }
        .section-header { margin-bottom: 40px; }
        .section-kicker {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            background: var(--warning);
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .section-kicker--dark {
            background: transparent;
            border-color: var(--white);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .section-title {
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .section-subtitle {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
            max-width: 600px;
        }
        .section--dark .section-subtitle,
        .section--black .section-subtitle { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7); }

        /* COURSE MAP */
        .map-container {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .map-embed {
            width: 100%;
            height: 500px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            background: #f0f0f0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .map-stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }

        /* STATS GRID */
        .stats-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .stats-grid--6 { grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr); }
        .stat-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .stat-value { font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .stat-value--large { font-size: 36px; }
        .stat-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .stat-sublabel {
            font-size: 9px;
            color: var(--brown);
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }

        /* HISTORY TIMELINE */
        .timeline { margin-top: 32px; }
        .timeline-item {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 80px 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            padding: 20px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .timeline-item:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
        .timeline-year {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--accent);
        }
        .timeline-content { font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.6; }

        /* COURSE BREAKDOWN */
        .course-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .course-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .course-card--highlight {
            background: var(--danger);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .course-card--highlight .course-mile,
        .course-card--highlight .course-desc { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.85); }
        .course-mile {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .course-name {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .course-desc {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: var(--brown);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* RATINGS */
        .rating-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
        }
        .rating-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .rating-card--dark {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .rating-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .rating-score { font-size: 48px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .rating-score span { font-size: 20px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .rating-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .rating-metrics { display: grid; gap: 12px; }
        .rating-metric {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        .rating-metric-label {
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            width: 100px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .rating-metric-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 12px;
            background: #eee;
            border: 1px solid var(--black);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-metric-bar {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
        }
        .rating-metric-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .rating-metric-value { font-weight: 700; width: 40px; text-align: right; }
        .rating-explanation {
            margin-top: 24px;
            padding-top: 24px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-explanation { border-top-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); }
        .rating-explanation p {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        /* OPINION */
        .opinion-card {
            background: var(--accent);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .opinion-verdict {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .opinion-title {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .opinion-text { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 16px; }
        .opinion-list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }
        .opinion-col-title {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        .opinion-col ul { list-style: none; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.8; }
        .opinion-col li { padding-left: 16px; position: relative; }
        .opinion-col li::before { content: ">"; position: absolute; left: 0; }

        /* BLACK PILL */
        .blackpill {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .blackpill-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            padding: 6px 14px;
            border: 2px solid var(--white);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .blackpill-title {
            font-size: 28px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
            max-width: 700px;
        }
        .blackpill-body {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            opacity: 0.85;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .blackpill-quote {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-style: italic;
            border-left: 3px solid var(--accent);
            padding-left: 20px;
            margin: 32px 0;
            max-width: 600px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
            padding: 20px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            font-size: 13px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote cite {
            display: block;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-style: normal;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-top: 12px;
            opacity: 0.5;
        }

        /* VERDICT */
        .verdict-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-card { border: var(--border); padding: 24px; }
        .verdict-card--yes { background: var(--accent); }
        .verdict-card--no { background: var(--white); }
        .verdict-header {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-list { list-style: none; }
        .verdict-list li {
            font-size: 13px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding-left: 20px;
            position: relative;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        .verdict-list li::before {
            content: ">";
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        /* TRAINING PLANS */
        .plans-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 12px;
        }
        .plan-card {
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 20px 16px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            transition: transform 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-card:hover {
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .plan-card--1 { background: var(--cream); }
        .plan-card--2 { background: #FFF8E1; }
        .plan-card--3 { background: var(--warning); }
        .plan-card--4 { background: #FFB830; }
        .plan-card--masters { background: var(--accent); }
        .plan-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: -10px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            font-size: 8px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .plan-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .plan-desc {
            font-size: 10px;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            min-height: 2em;
        }
        .plan-hours { font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 12px; }
        .plan-cta {
            display: block;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-cta:hover { background: var(--brown); }

        /* LOGISTICS */
        .logistics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .logistics-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .logistics-icon {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-title {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-value { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .logistics-detail { font-size: 11px; color: var(--brown); line-height: 1.6; }

        /* TWO COL */
        .two-col { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; }

        /* BUTTONS */
        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 14px 28px;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            border: var(--border);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .btn:hover {
            background: var(--brown);
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .btn--accent { background: var(--accent); color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline { background: transparent; color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline:hover { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }

        /* FOOTER */
        .footer {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 40px 0;
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .footer a { color: var(--accent); text-decoration: none; }

        /* RESPONSIVE */
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .hero-grid, .two-col, .rating-grid, .opinion-list { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid, .course-grid, .verdict-grid, .logistics-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid--6, .map-stats { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .plans-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .hero-title { font-size: 40px; }
        }
    
</style>

TIER 2 / ICONIC CEDAR CITY, UTAH 2024: April 6. 2025: Similar early-April weekend (check site) 127 MI

Belgian Waffle Ride Cedar City

"Half the climbing of San Diego. All the suffering. Plus miles of playground sand."

A real BWR, not watered-down. 'Slightly more approachable than San Diego' with less climbing but more sand and gravel. Same suffering, different landscape.

GET YOUR TRAINING PLAN
Gravel God Rating

[03] FACTS & HISTORY

How It Became THE Race

Created to bring the BWR 'quadrupel' style of mixed-surface brutality to high-desert Utah. Half the climbing of San Diego but more sand and gravel to keep the 'unroad' identity intact. 2024 weather-shortened edition proved organizers will shorten the route if safety demands it.

A real BWR, not watered-down. 'Slightly more approachable than San Diego' with less climbing but more sand and gravel. Same suffering, different landscape.

Key Moments
2020 Inaugural year - dry, dusty, demoralizing sand
2023 'Most fun I've had in a gravel race in a long time' - Adam Roberge
2024 Snowing sideways pre-race, course shortened due to freezing temps and high winds
[04] THE COURSE

Key Moments on the Route

'125 miles. 6k of climbing. 75% dirt. Starting at 5,600 ft. Technical riding and sand. Dry weather at elevation. Demoralizing.' The first 3.5 hours average 23 mph. The last 25 miles average pain.

Mile 0
The Fast Opening
First 3.5 hours at ~23 mph average. People burn matches trying to hold wheels in wind and on fast dirt, then pay later in the sand and climbs.
Mile 60
Sand & Wind Sectors
Miles of 'playground type sand' and crosswinds cook legs. Under-tired wheels knife into sand causing crashes or walking. Source Endurance recommends at least 40mm tires.
Mile 100
The Soul Crusher
The mile-100 sandy climb is 'the most challenging climb of the course' - steep, sandy, when you're already cracked. Many report using every gear and still grinding. Cramps and walking common.
Mile 105
Rocky Washboard Descent
20-minute rocky/technical section after the summit. 'A steep, washboarded descent jarring jaws and shoulders tenderized by 110 miles of mostly gravel.' Where tired riders crash or cramp.
[05] THE RATINGS

Course Profile Analysis

Course Profile Score
27/35
RADAR BREAKDOWN
Length
4/5
Technicality
4/5
Elevation
3/5
Climate
5/5
Altitude
3/5
Adventure
5/5
Logistics
3/5
What Each Score Means

Length (4/5): 127 miles with 6,500 ft of climbing. The distance is deceptive - the sand and late technical sections make the final 25 miles feel twice as long.

Technicality (4/5): Fast-rolling gravel with 'hidden treachery.' The playground sand and mile-100 rocky descent demand real bike handling skills. Under-tired riders get wrecked.

Elevation (4/5): ~6,500 ft total with the hardest climbing at mile 100 when you're already cracked. 'Half the climbing of San Diego' but concentrated in the worst possible places.

Climate (5/5): Early April weather is completely unpredictable. 2024 had snow and freezing temps. Good years are dry and dusty. Either way, cold starts and dehydration risk.

Altitude (3/5): Course rides 5,500-7,000 ft. Not extreme but noticeable. The combination with 127 miles and sand sectors amplifies the altitude effect.

Adventure (5/5): Expansive southern Utah valleys, ranch roads, high-desert beauty. Slowtwitch describes the 'beauty of expansive valleys' that feel endless when you're cracked.

Logistics (3/5): Cedar City Regional (CDC) is limited. Most fly to Vegas (LAS) or Salt Lake (SLC) and drive. College town with lodging but books up race weekend.

[06] BIASED OPINION

The Verdict

BWR Cedar City is what happens when you take the Waffle formula and add playground sand, mile-100 suffer-climbs, and Utah weather roulette. Half the climbing of San Diego but arguably more suffering b

Editorial Profile
27/35
OPINION SCORE

What Each Score Means

Prestige (4/5): Part of the respected Belgian Waffle Ride series and Life Time Grand Prix. The BWR brand carries weight. Deep pro fields (Stetina, Gomez Villafañe, Roberge).

Length (4/5): 127 miles with 6,500 ft of climbing. The distance is deceptive - the sand and late technical sections make the final 25 miles feel twice as long.

Technicality (4/5): Fast-rolling gravel with 'hidden treachery.' The playground sand and mile-100 rocky descent demand real bike handling skills. Under-tired riders get wrecked.

Elevation (3/5): ~6,500 ft total with the hardest climbing at mile 100 when you're already cracked. 'Half the climbing of San Diego' but concentrated in the worst possible places.

Climate (5/5): Early April weather is completely unpredictable. 2024 had snow and freezing temps. Good years are dry and dusty. Either way, cold starts and dehydration risk.

Altitude (3/5): Course rides 5,500-7,000 ft. Not extreme but noticeable. The combination with 127 miles and sand sectors amplifies the altitude effect.

Adventure (5/5): Expansive southern Utah valleys, ranch roads, high-desert beauty. Slowtwitch describes the 'beauty of expansive valleys' that feel endless when you're cracked.

Logistics (3/5): Cedar City Regional (CDC) is limited. Most fly to Vegas (LAS) or Salt Lake (SLC) and drive. College town with lodging but books up race weekend.

[X] THE BLACK PILL

THE THING NOBODY TELLS YOU

'Half the climbing of San Diego' sounds easier. It's not. The climbing is concentrated at mile 100 when you're already cracked from 3.5 hours of 23 mph racing and miles of energy-sapping sand. Then you descend on washboard while your hands and shoulders scream.

  • Under-tired = disaster. 40mm minimum for the sand. Many wish they'd gone bigger.
  • Burning matches early = detonation at mile 100. Save your legs for the soul-crusher climb.
  • April weather can end your race. 2024 was shortened due to snow and freezing temps.
"This is not an easier BWR. It's a different kind of hard. Train for sand, prepare for cold, save your matches for mile 100. The Instagram photos don't show the suffering."
[07] FINAL VERDICT

Is This Race For You?

[+] Race This If:
  • The BWR brand: Professional organization with gravel pedigree
  • The surprise factor: 'Half the climbing' sounds easy until you hit the sand
  • The scenery: Expansive Utah valleys are stunning (when you can look up)
[-] Skip This If:
  • The weather: April in Utah can mean snow, freezing temps, or 60°F
  • The sand: Miles of playground sand destroy under-tired riders
  • The mile-100 combo: Sandy climb into rocky descent is brutal timing
